Description:
Fully-Optioned & Ready to Relish!
In a family-focused quiet neighbourhood this distinctive 3 bedroom residence combines an exceptional 27sq floor plan with impressive inclusions to deliver a ready-made environment of quality, convenience & versatile style.
Beyond the impressive resort style facade, discover an immaculate & cleverly zoned interior showcasing a huge master bedroom with walk-in robe & private dual vanity ensuite, 2 large additional bedrooms (all with built-in robes) & main family bathroom. Add to this a separate formal lounge & spacious open-plan living/dining area with lush garden views from every window served by a well- appointed kitchen with 900mm cooking appliances, stone benchtops, dishwasher & deep pantry.
Other stand-out features include ducted heating & powerful split system cooling for all seasons comfort, high-ceilings, a comprehensive security system (alarm CCTV & video intercom), a double remote garage with internal and rear roller door access, family sized laundry with added storage & so much more!
Step outside & be greeted by a wonderful backyard garden with established trees & high hedged screening for added privacy, it also features automated watering system for the garden beds & if that's not enough, add to this an al-fresco entertaining area with quality Merbau decking, pull down blind, built in BBQ & a sense of relief that all the money has been spent on absolutely everything.
All this in a blue ribbon location, within a stone's throw to all of Craigieburn amenities, walking distance to a number of parks including Cross Keys Reserve, Thorngrove Reserve, Watermill Reserve, Malcolm Creek parkland & endless trails. A short walk to public transport, Highlands Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Central as well as easy access to YMCA childcare, Newbury Primary, Mount Ridley College & Hume Anglican Grammar.
Insights: 31 Kelway Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Proudly Presented With Location To Match...
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all. Comprising of ducted heating & evaporative cooling, large open plan kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking the meals area, formal lounge, open study, master bedroom with double built in robes & ensuite, built in robes to all bedrooms, remote control double lock up garage with internal access plus much more. Step outside and the home is complete with low maintenance landscaped gardens and alfresco area perfect for all occasions. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including a short stroll to Highlands Lake, Aitken Creek, Craigieburn Central, schools, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
Impressive Location.. Hop Skip and Jump to Craigieburn Plaza and Train Station.
This inviting home provides impressive proportions created to cater to family needs with minimum stress. Ideally situated close to Craigieburn Plaza Shopping Centre, Hanson Road bus service and Our Lady's Catholic Primary School, while parks and recreation facilities, are always easily reached.
Two distinctly zoned living areas are complemented by an open-plan kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, and ample storage. While four bedrooms and two bathrooms, including a main bedroom with an ensuite, provide accommodation of evident quality and comfort. Ducted gas heating and a secure remote controlled double garage with drive through access further enhance a home offering an exceptional opportunity for family or investment perspectives.

Description:
Location at its best!
Situated in the famous Mt Aitken estate, this amazing double storey residence caters to the whole family. As soon as you step inside you will witness an open formal lounge, flowing through to a spacious meals/family/kitchen area, fully equipped with stone bench tops & 900mm SS appliances, great sized pantry, spacious laundry with ample storage space and a separate powder room.
Upstairs features 4 outstanding size bedrooms, master with WIR & ensuite, and two additional bedrooms with BIR's. Entertaining guests will be a breeze with a relaxing alfresco area and low maintenance yards. Quality extras include: high ceilings, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm system & remote control double garage. All perfectly placed in a family-friendly location close to parks, transport & Craigieburn Central. Call your agent now for an inspection.

Step inside through the grand entrance to find stunning tiles floorboards throughout, large formal living area. The stunning kitchen with superior quality stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and stone bench tops and splash back. All set on corner allotment measuring 570m2 approx.

Description:
Family Perfection on the Park!
In a serene cul-de-sac looking out over the green spaces of Grosvenor Square Reserve, this
sensational Porter Davis ex-display residence delivers a truly outstanding family lifestyle
opportunity with its intelligent design, premium inclusions & fabulous living/entertaining spaces inside & out.   
Surrounded by landscaped gardens providing a leafy outlook from every window, the home's
interior is both well-connected yet cleverly zoned comprising an extra-large master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, as well as 3 additional bedrooms (built-in robes) & stylish main bathroom.
Along with a dedicated study/home office, the home also boasts a formal lounge with gas-log
fireplace, separate rumpus/TV room & expansive open-plan living/dining area complemented
by a Blanco-equipped kitchen with mirrored spashback & ample cupboard space.
Bi-folds reveal a fabulous enclosed al-fresco entertaining area leading out to a north-
facing yard with extensive decking, integrated spa & pergola, plus a large watertank &
working veggie garden to the rear.
Other stand-out features include heating & cooling, alarm system, high ceilings throughout,
large laundry, excellent storage options and remote-control double garage with internal entry. Also walking distance to the open spaces of Highlands Lake, Craigieburn Junction &
Craigieburn Central shopping centres, close to local schools & childcare facilities, endless
walking/cycling trails, public transport & major arterial roads.

Description:
Contemporary Ex-display with Ultimate Family Living
Quite extraordinary, this high-calibre home presents a lifestyle opportunity of luxury &
versatility with its vast two-level floorplan, extensive list of features & brilliant indoor/outdoor entertaining zones.
Bold & beautiful, the home's refined interior showcases an extra-large downstairs master
bedroom with its own dressing room & private ensuite, as well as 4 additional bedrooms (all
with robes) complemented by two sleek semi-ensuite bathrooms and guest powder room (fourth
WC).
Add to this a large study or home office, rumpus/retreat (upstairs), separate lounge & expansive open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a superb stone-bench kitchen with soft- close cabinetry, premium appliances & butler's pantry.
Along with ducted heating & evaporative cooling for year-round comfort, the home also boasts
stylish engineered floors & plantation shutters, a family-sized laundry, under-stair storeroom & remote-control double garage with internal entry.
Bi-folds from the living area lead out to a huge al-fresco area complete with gas-log fireplace for all-seasons entertaining, plus a wonderfully wide backyard with lush lawn area & established perimeter gardens.
In a uniquely quiet & convenient pocket, it's walking distance to the open spaces of Highlands Lake & Anzac Park, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, close to local schools & childcare facilities, endless walking/cycling trails, public transport & major arterial roads.

Description:
3 living areas plus 4 bedroom & study
This fantastic family home is ideal for the growing family and for entertaining.
From the moment you inspect this home you will be impressed with the open flowing floor
plan. This home offers 4 double size bedrooms, master with retreat area, ensuite & WIR.
Rumpus theatre room with projector and screen. Hostess kitchen with ceaser stone bench
tops and glass splash back.
Adjoins large meals area, separate formal lounge, & family/kids retreat area.
Enclosed alfresco and pergola with timber doors, lovely landscaped gardens, double garage with remote and 1.5kw of solar panels. This home comes with evaporative cooling, ducted heating, alarm system, intercom, plantation shutters and it situated a short stroll to the Highlands shopping centre and Richmond football club training facilities. Your inspection is highly recommended.

VICTORIAN SPENDOUR!
This wonderful Victorian style home offers all the charm that you would expect with its appealing facade and attention to quality and presentation, this home is sure to impress the fussiest of buyers all set on 540m2 approx of land. Comprising:
3 excellent size bedrooms plus open study or 4th bedroom, master with full ensuite and WIR, formal lounge / dining, large kitchen with ample cupboard space, meals area, open family room, bright second bathroom, timber floors throughout, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, alarm system, intercom, s/s appliances, dishwasher, quality window furnishings, d/garage with remote and drive through access to huge alfresco area great for all year round entertaining, work shed, water tank and the list goes on...

Description:
WELCOME HOME!!!! AFFORDABLE DOUBLE STOREY
Excellent opportunity to purchase this beautiful double storey home within walking distance to schools, shops, transport and parks.
Featuring:
formal entrance hallway leading to a spacious hostess kitchen, adjoining spacious meals with access to an Alfresco, large living room, huge rumpus room, 4 fantastic size bedrooms, two separate master bedrooms with dual access each to a bathroom, roomy laundry, two powder rooms, double remote garage with internal access and drive through access to a huge workshop.
Extras: ducted heating, alarm system, verticals, gas hot plates, wall oven, high ceilings throughout, low maintenance landscaped gardens finishes off this comfortable home.
For inspection please call: Romeo Sassine 0411 882 605.
